member.name: T:Atata.WebDriverSetup.DriverSetupConfiguration
member.summary: Represents the specific driver setup configuration.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using .

member.name: P:Atata.WebDriverSetup.DriverSetupConfiguration.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version. The default value is .

summary.para: Gets or sets the name of the environment variable that will be set with a value equal to the driver directory path.
The default value is specific to the driver being configured. It has "{BrowserName}Driver" format. For example: "ChromeDriver" or "InternetExplorerDriver".
The value means that none variable should be set.

member.summary: Represents the driver setup configuration builder.

member.summary: Gets the name of the browser.

member.name: M:Atata.WebDriverSetup.DriverSetupConfigurationBuilder.WithAutoVersion
member.summary: Sets the automatic driver version detection by installed browser version. If the version cannot be detected automatically, latest driver version should be used.

member.summary: Sets the latest version of driver.

member.name: M:Atata.WebDriverSetup.DriverSetupConfigurationBuilder.ByBrowserVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the browser version. It will find driver version corresponding to the browser version.

member.summary: Sets the version of driver to use.

summary.para: Sets the name of the environment variable that will be set with a value equal to the driver directory path.
The default value is specific to the driver being configured. It has "{BrowserName}Driver" format. For example: "ChromeDriver" or "InternetExplorerDriver".
The value means that none variable should be set.

member.summary: Gets or sets the proxy.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use version cache. The default value is .

member.summary: Gets or sets the specific version check interval. The default value is 2 hours.
